title: This years Victorious skin and how it's determined? n . n
body:
So I was just wondering what people think this years victorious skin will go to? I know it's still too early in the year, but I heard that the Victorious skin is based off either who plays which champ the most in the LCS or a champ that really impacted their games, like a player making awesome plays with that champion or something? I don't follow the LCS so I was just wondering what peoples thoughts were on which skin it might possibly be and how the skin is actually determined? I was just thinking about this today cause i was gonna play ranked and yeah c: Thanks ^ - ^

Just a fun question too, which champ do you wish for it to be? :3 Me? Aha welp - Victorious {{champion:119}} or {{champion:122}}  would be just lovely <3 They could even have Viktorious Viktor, purposely making the C a K for the lolz c:

replies.body:
i think it will be sejuani
victorius skins are mostly based of the viability and impact they have on the game
sejuani has had a HUGE impact being picked or banned in almost every ranked game that i have played
Oh okay c: So it's not entirely based within the LCS and all that? Guess no Victorious Darius or Draven for me </3 paha. But I play Sej so that'd still be nice n . n

Victorious Draven would look SO cool.
And sound SO cocky.
Oml ikr? I had a dream they made Victorious Draven LOL. He legit needs one though just because of his personality xD

for a adc i would think it would be along the lines of : sivir, jinx, graves
but if you go with the most impactful its more likely to be :sejuani or hecrium imo. both have hugely changed the way the game is played (maybe a gragas, rek'sai or nautilus too)

If we're going by the most played ADC this year so far, then without a doubt it'll be {{champion:222}} 
(Go to the lolking Charts). I'd personally prefer it if {{champion:15}} got the skin, but it'd be nice as an ADC main for a Victorious skin.

Janna: Support
Jarvan: Jungle
Elise: Top
Morgana: MId

So the next one might be an ADC to complete the set

I think Victorious Ashe would look bomb as {{champion:22}}
I'm hoping it's an adc! Fingers crossed c: An Ashey one would be pre sweet, lots of people play her too~
especially after her rework :P
This season it will be an ADC.
I feel lucky playing ranked this year xD If it's an adc I'm rapped! Main role and I love 'em all c:

> [{quoted}](name=ThatzSoDraven,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XpWoAd45,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-03T12:28:18.503+0000)
>
> I feel lucky playing ranked this year xD If it's an adc I'm rapped! Main role and I love 'em all c:

Jarven = Top
Janna = Support
Elise = Jungle
Morgana = Mid
???? = ADC

It's logical. :p
Didn't think they made the skins that way from the role, but cool c:
Lol that'd be nice, then I don't have to get to gold :3 S1 to G5 is a bish to get promoted. :s

needs to be a victorious urgot

i mean, hes actually getting played now.
Victorious Urgod, I like it :3
same, give a dude who no one (well the casual players) knows about and give him some iffmm to up him up like riven / sion :D
Why no Victorious Garen lol :(
well that would just be weird in just about everyway (personally)
Maybe cause there's already Victorious J4? xD No more Demacians o v o huehuehue.

it's normally a champ that's been played a lot in the season.
so whichever adc has seen the most play will most likely get it
Too bad people don't play Draven or Darius more :s aha
I think it should be Victorious Talon, screw SSW talon I want Victorious Talon.
Yes! Another victorious Noxian! Yeah the SSW Talon is a bit meh in my opinion xD
